ctl:function.name: owsFunctions:validateVersion
ctl:function.ctl:description: Validates that versionString is in x.y.z format with values less than 100

xsl:value-of.select: boolean(matches($versionString,'\d\.\d\.\d') and (every $d in tokenize($versionString,'\.') satisfies round(number($d)) lt 100))

ctl:function.name: owsFunctions:incrementVersion
ctl:function.ctl:description: Increments the "y" sub-version in a versionString is in x.y.z format. Used for version negotiation testing.

ctl:function.name: owsFunctions:checkExceptionReport
ctl:function.ctl:param: The locator to check; a * can be provided to indicate that any locator value is allowed; a ^ can be provided to indicate that no locator value is allowed
ctl:function.ctl:description: Validates an ExceptionReport and checks for specific exceptionCode and locator values

xsl:value-of.select: concat($exceptionCodeToCheck, ',', $locatorToCheck, ',true,', $exceptionCodeValue, ',', $locatorValue, '|')
concat($exceptionCodeToCheck, ',', $locatorToCheck, ',', string(not($locatorValue) or $locatorValue = ''), ',', $exceptionCodeValue, ',', $locatorValue, '|')
concat($exceptionCodeToCheck, ',', $locatorToCheck, ',', string(contains(lower-case(string($locatorToCheck)), lower-case(string($locatorValue)))), ',', $exceptionCodeValue, ',', $locatorValue, '|')
concat($exceptionCodeToCheck, ',', $locatorToCheck, ',false,', $exceptionCodeValue, ',', $locatorValue, '|')

ctl:function.name: owsFunctions:validateExceptionReport
ctl:function.ctl:param: Exception code, or codes separated by commas, e.g. MissingParameterValue,InvalidParameterValue
Locator code or codes, separated by commas, e.g. service,request
"one" if only one specified exception and locator code pair must be found to pass, or "all" if all are
HTTP status code required by test to be returned by server
ctl:function.ctl:description: Validates an ExceptionReport and checks for supplied exceptionCode(s) and locator value(s)

ctl:message.select: concat('Validating ows:ExceptionReport against its XML Schema ', $exceptionReportSchemaPath, ' for codes ', $exceptionCodes, ' locators ', $locators)

xsl:when.ctl:message: Exception report failed schema validation; elapsedTime: [] milliseconds
results:

ctl:message.select: concat('Required HTTP status code ', $httpStatusCode, ' was returned by server.')
concat('Returned HTTP status code ', $returnedStatusCode, ' did not match required code ', $httpStatusCode)

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: exception.validation.elapsed [] milliseconds
Exception report is XML Schema valid, continuing...

ctl:message.select: concat('The returned exception report contained expected exceptionCode ', $exceptionCode, ' with locator ', $locatorReturned, ' valid for specified locator ', $locator)
concat('The returned exception report contained expected exceptionCode ', $exceptionCode, ' with locator ', $locatorReturned, ' not valid for specified locator ', $locator)
concat('The returned exception report contained unexpected exceptionCode ', $exceptionCodeReturned, ' with locator ', $locatorReturned)

xsl:when.ctl:message: Exception report does not contain required valid exception code(s) and locator(s)

ctl:message.select: concat('Required HTTP status code ', $httpStatusCode, ' was returned by server.')
concat('Returned HTTP status code ', $returnedStatusCode, ' did not match required code ', $httpStatusCode)

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Exception report contains required valid exception code(s) and locator(s)

ctl:message.select: concat('Required HTTP status code ', $httpStatusCode, ' was returned by server.')
concat('Returned HTTP status code ', $returnedStatusCode, ' did not match required code ', $httpStatusCode)
